title: News24.com | NICD's top epidemiologist: How the Covid-19 pandemic is evolving and why we should be concerned
description: The mildness of Covid-19 symptoms is the sting in the tail of a virus that has killed thousands across the globe. A top epidemiologist explained why this was worrying for South AfrIca.
content:
A top epidemiologist has warned the Covid-19 epidemic is evolving in the country.
This means it has moved from the importation of cases to low level local transmission whereby people, who have not yet been tested for the virus, are spreading it to their fami… [+7742 chars]
